room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Countdown Escape Room in Virginia Beach
review: This was an absolutely awesome experience! We celebrated my daughter's 12th birthday doing the Titanic escape. The set up was great, the concept was keen and the amazing staff topped off the event. Scott and his crew were fantastic. This is one of the few places that dedicate the room to your party alone which also made it really fun. It's a rare thing to see 6 preteens have such a good time without electronics! We'll definitely go back and I highly recommend this particular escape room company!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Countdown Escape Room in Virginia Beach
review: This was our second escape room but first time here and we chose the Titanic. It was a blast and not just because we escaped. The staff was awesome and what's not to love about private bookings. We will definitely be back to try our luck in their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Countdown Escape Room in Virginia Beach
review: We loved this place soooo much we went back for a second escape the day after our first! We conquered Titanic and Hidden Treasure!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Countdown Escape Room in Virginia Beach
review: We had a great time, we enjoyed ourselves. The Titanic room was quite clever, we will definitely be back to try a different escape room.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Countdown Escape Room in Virginia Beach
review: Just conquered the Titanic! So much fun! Everyone enjoyed it! We will definitely come back to conquer the other rooms!
